pageContext.title: FanSided Taps OpenWeb to Drive Community Engagement Across Their Nearly 300 Platforms
pageContext.excerpt: Today we’re excited to announce our partnership with FanSided, one of the fastest-growing networks of fans in sports, entertainment, and lifestyle. Through our partnership, we’ll empower FanSided’s two million daily readers with the ability to better engage in high-quality community interactions with other fans. “As a technology-first media company, we value innovative tech that allowsRead More
pageContext.content:
Today we’re excited to announce our partnership with FanSided, one of the fastest-growing networks of fans in sports, entertainment, and lifestyle. Through our partnership, we’ll empower FanSided’s two million daily readers with the ability to better engage in high-quality community interactions with other fans.

“As a technology-first media company, we value innovative tech that allows us to provide the best user experiences while fostering a community with our sports and entertainment fanbases,” said Betsy Cohen, VP of Product at FanSided.

“OpenWeb’s technology has provided our 300 websites with a platform that enables our readers to have authentic conversations, increasing the scale and quality of FanSided’s audience engagement.”

The best part? Engagement has already nearly doubled since FanSided implemented OpenWeb’s technology. 

In fact, sports is one of our highest performing verticals in regards to retention rate, typically seeing 40% of visitors returning month over month.

We’re thrilled to support FanSided by enabling the healthy, civil conversations that serve as the basis for a thriving community.

To learn more about our partnership with FanSided, read our press release.
